attributes.action: Appoint Hulk Hogan as the secretary of state for Northern Ireland
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: If Hulk Hogan was the secretary of state he would soon sort out all the problems that lie in Northern Ireland.  Look what Arnold Scwarzenegger did for California.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
